localConnection.heading: Local Connection
localConnection.subheading: See what your local stores have before you even step outside

step1.label: Step 1
step1.title: search & find a product
step1.description: Once Vesko is available, you‚Äôll be able to search and filter products easily. You can also use our map to see all nearby stores that sell on Vesko, how far they are, and their opening hours. Note: to use the mobile app, you‚Äôll need to register with just your email.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.title: Check product availability
step2.description: Once you find a product you want to buy, just go to its product details page. There, you can read all the info posted by the seller and check if the item (a specific size) is available on the store‚Äôs shelves. If you spot a product in your home feed, simply tap the ‚ÄúBuy Now‚Äù button or click anywhere on the product photo to open its details.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: Buy in-store
step3.description: When you find a product you like and it‚Äôs available, you can visit the store to see and feel it before making your final decision. The store profile shows opening hours and location to help you get there easily.
step3.description2: When you find a product you like and it‚Äôs available, you can visit the store to see and feel it before making your final decision. The store profile shows opening hours and location to help you get there easily.

values.title: VESKO
values.heading: as a Social media,
values.heading4: the foundation of everything we do

step1.heading: üõ°Ô∏è¬†Safe Place to share your life without fear
step1.text1: Built and designed by people, for people. We believe everyone has the right to share their life without fear, no matter who they are, what they believe in, who they love, their background, skin colour, or appearance.
step1.text2: Like many of you, we‚Äôve felt how today‚Äôs social media spaces have grown more hostile, overwhelmed by conflict, misinformation, and negativity. And just like the real world shapes our digital lives, the tone of our online communities often echoes back into how we treat one another offline.
step1.text3: That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre building Vesko: a friendlier, more respectful digital space designed to foster real connection. To make that possible, Vesko follows a strict Zero Tolerance Policy for bullying, racism, harassment, and incitement to violence.

step2.heading: ‚öñÔ∏è¬†Neutral Digital Space: we pick no sides!
step2.text1: Like Switzerland, Vesko stays neutral. In a world where billionaires build or buy social platforms to push their own narratives, and while others take political sides or promote ideologies, we choose another way.
step2.text2: We believe neutrality is the key to healthier, more peaceful communities.

step3.heading: Connecting People by turning online interactions into real-world engagement
step3.text1: By starting your shopping journey digitally and ending in your local store, Vesko will strengthens the community bonds.
step3.text2: You don‚Äôt just scroll and socialise, you help real businesses in your area to survive.
step3.text3: This brings life back to your city, helping turn quiet streets into vibrant neighbourhoods.

hero.title: About Vesko
hero.subtitle: Read why we're building Vesko, and get to know something about us
hero.tagline: Discover our story, values, and mission to create a better digital world

whatIsVesko.title: What is Vesko
whatIsVesko.description: Vesko is more than just another social media platform with online stores, it connects people with their local brick-and-mortar shops by turning them into virtual showrooms. This means shoppers can interact with physical stores digitally: browse what's in stock, check availability, and plan their visit, all before stepping outside. Vesko brings the real world to you digitally, making offline shopping smarter and more convenient. It's the first social commerce platform that connects people with the real world, digitally.

why.title: Connecting & Empowering People
why.mission: Our Mission is to create a safe social digital space that connects people while empowering small retail businesses.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: We believed technology was supposed to create solutions, not more problems and to connect us, not divide us. But today, platforms feel noisy, divisive, and draining.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: That's why we're building Vesko, to reconnect people, not just digitally, but locally and to bring communities closer.
solution.additional: A space where you can be yourself, without fear of judgment for who you are, what you believe, or whom you love.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: We want to create a safe social digital environment while empowering small businesses

omnistore.title: Our Technology: OmniStore
omnistore.description: We've developed a new technology called OmniStore, an affordable, easy-to-use solution that helps offline retailers sell online and attract customers by allowing people to browse real-time product availability and in-store offerings.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.content: Vesko's story began in 2019 in Joensuu, a small city in eastern Finland, where founder Leo Fadi noticed how local retail shops were shutting down year after year.

realization.title: Understanding the Impact
realization.content: As an entrepreneur himself, he understood that behind every small business is a family or a young entrepreneur so when a store shuts down, it's not just empty windows; he saw families losing their source income, and young entrepreneurs watching their dreams fall apart.

problem.title: Digital Divide
problem.content: As digital shopping behaviors grew, it became clear that small businesses weren't dying because people stopped shopping offline, they were struggling because they didn't have access to the same digital tools as big retailers.

solution.title: R&D
solution.content: Research and development were launched to evaluate potential solutions, use cases, and business models, laying a solid foundation for the forthcoming company.

starting.title: Starting Vesko
starting.content: Vesko‚Äôs team set off to build Vesko by  offering small business an online store to meet modern shoppers‚Äô expectations for digital discovery and product availability.

vision.title: Beyond Commerce
vision.content: And second, by rethinking social media itself. Mainstream platforms have become more toxic than helpful, pushing empty content over meaningful connection.

mission.title: Purpose-Driven Platform
mission.content: So Vesko was also built as a social space with a purpose: to reconnect people to each other and to the local businesses that keep communities alive. At its heart, Vesko is a response to both a market need and a human one.

quote.text: At its heart, Vesko is a response to both a market need and a human one.
quote.author: Leo Fadi, Founder

ourValues.title: What We Value

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We listen, we care, and we design with people in mind, creating a space where everyone feels seen and respected.

peace.title: Peace
peace.description: We foster a calm, fair, and supportive environment, both digitally and in the real world.

friendliness.title: Friendliness
friendliness.description: We believe social platforms should feel like neighborhoods, welcoming, kind, and open to real connection.

neutrality.title: Neutrality
neutrality.description: We keep things simple, authentic, and grounded in everyday life. As a platform, we don't take sides, only a stand for peace, fairness, and mutual respect.

ourValues.conclusion: These values guide everything we do, from product design to community building, ensuring Vesko remains a platform that truly serves people and communities.

unSDGs.title: UN Sustainable Development Goals
unSDGs.introduction: Vesko is being built with sustainability at its core. Once launched, it will drive impact on multiple levels from empowering local economies to reducing environmental strain. By supporting small retailers with smart, affordable digital tools, Vesko directly contributes to several UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). It's not just about transforming how people shop, it's about building a fairer, greener, and more resilient future for everyone. Here's how Vesko aligns with key SDGs:

sdg8.title: Decent Work & Economic Growth
sdg8.description: By digitalising small retailers, Vesko fosters economic inclusion, boosts local commerce, and creates jobs.

sdg9.title: Industry, Innovation & Infrastructure
sdg9.description: Providing SMEs with scalable omnichannel solutions enhances digital infrastructure and innovation in retail.

sdg10.title: Reduced Inequalities
sdg10.description: By providing affordable tech to small businesses, Vesko helps bridge the gap and creates more equal opportunities.

sdg11.title: Sustainable Cities & Communities
sdg11.description: Strengthening local businesses reduces reliance on imports, fostering self-sufficient and resilient urban economies.

sdg12.title: Responsible Consumption & Production
sdg12.description: Demand forecasting and reducing reliance on large warehouses help cut retail waste and improve resource efficiency.

sdg13.title: Climate Action
sdg13.description: By localising trade and reducing long-distance shipping, Vesko minimises carbon emissions from logistics.

sdg17.title: Partnerships for the Goals
sdg17.description: Collaborating with retailers, tech providers, and policymakers supports sustainable economic growth and digital transformation.

unSDGs.conclusion: Together, these SDGs represent our commitment to building a sustainable, inclusive, and prosperous future for all.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.text1: Vesko Ltd. is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we handle your personal data. This policy may be updated, and the latest version can always be found on this page. We will also notify you of significant changes by email.
introduction.text2: This privacy policy applies to personal data we collect from the waitlist and the 'demo request' contact form. Vesko Ltd., business ID 3472131-6, is the controller responsible for your personal data.

purpose.heading: Purpose of Processing and Legal Basis

waitlist.heading: Waitlist
waitlist.text1: Joining the waitlist and sending you important updates regarding the development and release date of Vesko applications.
waitlist.text2: Contact information (name, phone number, email address).

options1.heading: Purpose of Processing:
options1.text: Sending demo requests and displaying product reviews on the website.

options2.heading: Categories of Personal Data:
options2.text: Contact information (name, phone number, email address).

dataProtection.heading: Protection and Retention of Personal Data
dataProtection.text1: Only authorised Vesko Ltd. employees have the right to access customer system data. Each system user has personal credentials and passwords, and employees use the data only as necessary for their work tasks.
dataProtection.text2: Personal data will be retained only as long as necessary to fulfil the purpose of the processing or as required by applicable laws. You may request the deletion of your data at any time.

dataTransfer.heading: Transfers of Data Outside the EU/EEA
dataTransfer.text: Personal data will only be processed within the EU/EEA.

personalDataRight.heading: Your Rights Regarding Personal Data

options1.heading: Right to Deletion:
options1.text: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data. We will delete your data if there is no legal basis for retaining it, such as a legal obligation. We will also delete the data if the processing was based on consent and you withdraw your consent, or if you object to the processing and there are no other legal grounds for processing.

options2.heading: Right to Object to Processing:
options2.text: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal data, for example, if the processing is based on legitimate interest.

options3.heading: Right to Access Your Data:
options3.text: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we have collected about you. If you make such a request, we may ask for additional information to verify your identity before releasing the data.

options4.heading: Right to Rectification:
options4.text: If you find that the information we have about you is inaccurate or incomplete, you have the right to request the correction of the data.

personalDataRight.privacyContactText: To exercise your rights, please contact us via email: vesko.finland@gmail.com

dataSharing.heading: Sharing Data with Third Parties
dataSharing.text: We do not share personal data with third parties without your consent.

updatePolicy.text: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and store your personal data in compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This policy may be updated, and the latest version can always be found on this page. Note that your data will not be handed over to a third party nor processed outside Finland and we will also notify you of any significant changes by email.

main.heading: Payments & Logistics Made Easy
main.subheading: Whether you're an individual entrepreneur or a small offline retailer expanding online, Vesko streamlines your payment and delivery processes. Our integrated solution, powered by Stripe for payments and nShift for shipping, let's you focus on fulfilling orders and growing your business and we'll handle the heavy lifting in the background. Below is a concise overview of how Vesko‚Äôs payment and logistics features benefit you, saving time and costs while improving your customer experience.

payment.heading: Secure Payments Powered by Stripe
payment.subheading: Vesko uses Stripe, a world-class payment platform, to ensure your online transactions are fast, secure, and hassle-free. Stripe is trusted by businesses of all sizes ‚Äì from startups to Fortune 500 companies like Google and Amazon so you and your customers can have peace of mind. With Vesko‚Äôs Stripe integration, you get:

option1.heading: Easy, Secure Checkout:
option1.description: Accept all major credit/debit cards and digital wallets (e.g. Apple Pay, Google Pay) in 135+ currencies. Stripe is PCI Level 1 certified, the highest grade of payment security, making every transaction highly secure. Advanced fraud prevention (Stripe Radar) further safeguards your business and customers.

option2.heading: Transparent Low Fees:
option2.description: There are no setup or monthly fees for using Stripe‚Äôs basic services you only pay a small standard transaction fee per sale (e.g. ~2.9% + $0.30, +possible  Vesko‚Äôs charge per transaction and this will depend on your subscription plan) with no hidden charges or binding contracts. This pay-as-you-go pricing keeps costs predictable and flexible for small businesses.

option3.heading: Quick Setup, Direct Payouts:
option3.description: Getting started is simple with Stripe‚Äôs easy onboarding. Payments from your customers go directly into your own account  (Vesko will not hold your funds). Stripe‚Äôs fast payout system means you receive your revenue quickly, improving cash flow.

option4.heading: Global and Scalable:
option4.description: As your business grows, Stripe scales with you. You can accept international payments (135+ currencies) and multiple payment methods without additional Complexity (Vesko will be available worldwide). There are also options for subscriptions, invoicing, and more as needed, all under the same platform.

option5.heading: Reliability & Support:
option5.description: Stripe‚Äôs infrastructure is renowned for its uptime and speed, processing thousands of transactions per second worldwide. You benefit from that reliability, plus detailed reporting and analytics to track your sales on your store panel.

payment.description: With Vesko and Stripe, you get enterprise-grade payment processing with zero fuss. Your customers enjoy a smooth, trustworthy checkout experience, while you enjoy low fees and no extra admin work on payment compliance or security,  it‚Äôs all handled for you.

logistics.heading: Hassle-Free Shipping Powered By nShift
logistics.subheading: Logistics can be one of the most time-consuming parts of online selling, but Vesko‚Äôs integration with nShift makes shipping efficient and worry-free. nShift is a leading delivery management platform that connects to over 1,000 carriers worldwide, allowing even small businesses to offer fast, affordable delivery options.

features.heading: Here‚Äôs how Vesko‚Äôs nShift-powered Order Management System helps you:

option1.heading: Access 1000+ Carriers & Best Rates:
option1.description: Through nShift, Vesko gives you instant access to the world‚Äôs largest carrier network. You can offer a variety of shipping options (postal services, couriers, express shippers, etc.) to your customers. The system automatically selects or recommends the best carrier service for each order based on cost and speed, so you save on shipping costs while meeting customer expectations. No need to negotiate separate contracts, you tap into a vast delivery network out of the box.

option2.heading: Automatic Label Creation:
option2.description: The moment an order comes in, our system generates shipping labels and documentation for you. nShift‚Äôs platform allows you to print labels in Vesko‚Äôs store panel quickly and accurately for any carrier. This means no manual data entry or visiting multiple carrier websites, simply print the provided label and attach it to the package. You can even create return labels easily if needed for a smooth returns process.

option3.heading: Real-Time Tracking & Estimate Time Of arrival (ETA) Updates:
option3.description: Vesko will provide you and your customers with the ability to track every shipment through nShift‚Äôs unified tracking system but all will be within Vesko so you don‚Äôt have to go anywhere. Vesko‚Äôs Track-and-trace features powered by nShift  allow you and your customers to monitor shipments in real time and get detailed status updates, regardless of the carrier. Your customers can even see estimated delivery dates (ETA) when available, giving them confidence and reducing ‚ÄúWhere is my order?‚Äù inquiries. Vesko‚Äôs dashboard/store panel provides you full visibility on all orders. You'll know exactly which orders are in transit, delivered, or pending fulfillment at a glance.

option4.heading: Minimal Effort for You:
option4.description: Vesko‚Äôs use of nShift essentially gives you a built-in order management system for shipping. The integration is so seamless that handling shipments becomes almost automatic. For example, many businesses find that nShift works behind the scenes so well that it feels like an invisible part of their own system. All you need to do is pack the orders, carrier booking, pickup scheduling, tracking emails, and updates can be handled by the system. This drastically reduces manual workload and errors, letting you fulfill orders faster and more accurately.

option5.heading: Customer Satisfaction & Trust:
option5.description: By providing shipment tracking and reliable delivery estimates, you keep your customers happy and informed. Proactive updates and on-time deliveries help build trust in your online store.

logistics.description: Vesko simplifies logistics to the point where shipping is no longer a headache for your business. You get the power of an enterprise-grade delivery system, wide carrier choice, automation, and live tracking without needing any special expertise or staff. This not only saves you countless hours (and associated labor costs) but also often leads to better shipping rates and fewer mistakes, ultimately saving you money and improving your service quality.

benefits.heading: Why Does It Matters for You?
benefits.subheading: Vesko‚Äôs payment and logistics integration is designed to make online selling as easy as possible for you. By partnering with Stripe and nShift (leaders in their fields), we ensure you get world-class service at affordable costs. The result is a streamlined operation where you only have to fulfill orders, and our system takes care of the rest, from charging the customer securely to printing the shipping label and updating the tracking info. It‚Äôs a complete solution that lets you save more, sell more, and stress less.

option1.heading: Time & Labor Savings:
option1.description: No more juggling multiple tools or manual processes. Our one-stop solution can speed up order processing significantly, freeing you to focus on products and customers instead of paperwork. Cost Savings: You avoid upfront costs on payment terminals or expensive software.

option2.heading: Professionalism & Growth:
option2.description: Vesko gives you the same robust infrastructure that big e- commerce players enjoy. This means even as a one-person operation or a small shop, you can offer professional-grade checkout and delivery. Happier customers lead to repeat business and positive reviews, fueling your growth. And when your order volume rises, Vesko scales seamlessly without added complexity.

option3.heading: Peace of Mind:
option3.description: Security, compliance, and reliability are handled by our platform and partners. Every payment is encrypted and fraud-checked and every shipment is tracked. You don‚Äôt have to worry about technical headaches or negotiating with carriers. It just works, so you can operate with confidence.

join.heading: Join Vesko
join.description: and experience how effortless managing an online business can be with the right payment and logistics support behind you. Spend less time on admin, save money on fees and shipping, and deliver a better experience to your customers,  all with Vesko.
